BadgeDetail.Name: Starting & Charging I
BadgeDetail.Description: Employer: This badge demonstrates the earner understands the fundamentals of ignition systems. They can replace a starter motor and alternator, adjust an accessory belt, check a battery's state of charge and replace it.

Task.Title: Starter motors and alternators
Task.Body: Upload evidence replacing a starter motor and alternator, and show how the accessory belt is adjusted.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence replacing a starter motor and alternator, and show how the accessory belt is adjusted.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence replacing a starter motor and alternator, and show how the accessory belt is adjusted.

Task.Title: Battery
Task.Body: Upload evidence showing how to check a battery's state of charge and replacing an old battery with a new one.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence showing how to check a battery's state of charge and replacing an old battery with a new one.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence showing how to check a battery's state of charge and replacing an old battery with a new one.
